ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Imbrued gloves?
ygData.msgSnippet: Good point, pre-level 50 and VoV, its probably worthwhile to use.  I didn t get mine until level 50 though, so its usefulness has been limited. Elwyn ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Good point, pre-level 50 and VoV, its probably worthwhile to use. I didn't
get mine until level 50 though, so its usefulness has been limited.


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Thursday, March 09, 2000 2:22 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Imbrued gloves?


From: <kim@...>

On Thu, 9 Mar 2000, Greg Gillan wrote:
>
> worth of the item. We use a 1-5 scale with a McVaxius' Horn of Suckiness
> being an example of a 1, and a Cloak of Flames being an example of a 5.
For
> every raid that you attend, you recieve 1 point. When an item drops, the

Don't underestimate McVaxius' War Horn. I won it in a lotto
and didn't think much of it at the time. Lately, since I've
been using the all-instrument approach, it's pretty simple for
me to swap in the Horn for a Lute when I pulse Beserkers.
With the War Horn, Beserkers gives 1 less strength and 1 less
AC than Warsong (+29 str, +19 AC IIRC), but affects the entire
group. The speedup at my level is roughly on par with
Celerity, and only slightly slower than Warsong. So I'm
basically giving a slightly toned down version of Warsong to
everyone in the group.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
